Text:
You get to see and hear a sociological, academic, and historio-cultural viewpoint on the interplay of porn, culture, and technology, all interwoven with boobies. Definitely worth a look-see.

Interviews with porn producers, actors, actresses, directors, academics, business leaders, and others all document of where the porn industry has been and is headed in the future - and the central theme is PROFIT - profit, profit, and profit.

There's even a short segment on Danni Ashe, Japanese anime porn, and porn games...this "documentary" covers it all. Actually a pretty informative program with a lot of GREAT one-liners.
